physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No goiter appreciated at birth, normal size and contour of thyroid gland on 99m pertechnetate scan, moderate mixed hearing loss bilaterally at 1 month, failure to thrive at 1 year and 8 months, mild delay in gross motor development at 3 years and 2 months, diffuse visible goiter at 4 years and 8 months, hearing loss assessed at 45 dB at 500 Hz and 55 dB at 4000 Hz.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial absence of goiter changed to observable goiter at 4 years and 8 months, hearing loss progressed with consistent audiometry findings.
Goiter size increased leading to a thyroidec-tomy at 8.75 years due to further increase.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Verbal, performance, and total IQ scores categorized as mildly mentally retarded (49, 55, 50), significant speech defect, hyperactivity noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Developmental impairments and IQ decline noted over time.
